**Overview**

This dashboard shows statistics specific to the Flow Datastream captured by the Network Packet Capture Integration.

Other networking dashboards are also available on the [**Security Solution Page**](/app/security/explore)



[**Integration Page**](/app/integrations/detail/network_traffic-1.13.0/overview)
